title: Evaluations

definitions.Object Counting: A method to determine the number of items in a collection by adding them together.
definitions.Logical Deduction Objects: A set of three objects arranged in a fixed order, used to test logical reasoning.

formulas: 2 fish + 4 cats + 2 chickens + 1 mouse + 1 goat = 10 animals
summary: The slide presents examples of model outputs on BigBench-hard, including an object counting problem and a logical deduction object problem. It shows the step-by-step reasoning before and after training, highlighting the model's improved reasoning capabilities.
